import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Descriptions, Divider, Breadcrumb, Button, Input, message, InputNumber, DatePicker, Tag, Select, Col, Row, Space, Affix } from 'antd'; import { BrowserRouter, Link, Switch, Route } from 'react-router-dom' import { SearchOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons' import './index.css' import reqwest from 'reqwest'; const { RangePicker } = DatePicker; export default class Om extends Component { state = { date: [] } dateOnChange = (value, dateString) => { console.log('Formatted Selected Time: ', dateString); this.setState({ date: dateString }) } OmSearch = () => { console.log(this.state.date) let [oid, ofName, date] = [ this.idInput.value, this.nameInput.state.value, this.state.date ] const data = { oid, ofName, date } console.log(data) reqwest({ url: 'searchorderform', method: 'post', type: 'json', data: data }) } render() { return (
主页 订单信息管理 展示订单信息，查询订单，查看订单状态，处理订单的发货，确认送达和退款
订单id: { this.idInput = elev }} />
用户名称: { this.nameInput = elev }} />
时间: { this.dateElev = elev }} />
) } }
